snp5.8:1084: "Ye me pubbe viyākaṁsu,Huraṁ gotamasāsanā;Iccāsi iti bhavissati,Sabbaṁ taṁ itihītihaṁ;Sabbaṁ taṁ takkavaḍḍhanaṁ,Nāhaṁ tattha abhiramiṁ.
snp5.8:1085: Tvañca me dhammamakkhāhi,taṇhānigghātanaṁ muni;Yaṁ viditvā sato caraṁ,tare loke visattikaṁ".
snp5.8:1087: Etadaññāya ye satā,Diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā;Upasantā ca te sadā,Tiṇṇā loke visattikan"ti.
